descriptions.short: Hi, I’m Ryan. I make websites 👨‍💻.
descriptions.fairlyShort: Hi, I’m Ryan. In my spare time, I've taught myself to make websites.
descriptions.long: Hi, I’m Ryan. I’m a self taught junior web-developer in my spare time. I use react JS to make beautiful front end applications.
descriptions.longAf: Hi, I’m Ryan. I’m a self taught junior web-developer in my spare time, outside of my full time job. I use React JS to make beautiful front end applications.
